TopicTitle: Can't switch to vessels via the Tracking Station, can't switch to vessel at Eve

Articles.Content:
I can't select any vessels at the Tracking Station. I can click one of them and it will zoom to it, but the vessel's button on the side won't be inverted like I've actually clicked it, and the fly/terminate/recover buttons are still greyed out. Once I've 'selected' one ship, I can't click to change view to any others at all.

I can switch to nearby ships that are in the Kerbin system by launching some random vessel and switching to something else via the map view, but that doesn't work when I try switching to my Eve ship. I'm using Sandbox mode so this isn't because I haven't unlocked something.

Please help, my crew have been stuck in Eve orbit for over a year now. D:

(I haven't installed any new mods between last playing the save file and now, but I have uninstalled a couple - Soundtrack Editor, and AmpYear Power Manager.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-14T01:38:34Z" title="03/14/2015 01:38  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 14, 2015</time> by yorshee**

I don't know those mods, but I once has a similar problem when uninstalling a mod (I think it was Interstellar); the mod had added a resource to all my ships, which caused them to fail to load. (KSP seems to check for missing parts and remove ships with them, but not missing resources.) So you might try reinstalling the mods you uninstalled and see if that helps.

> 
> I don't know those mods, but I once has a similar problem when uninstalling a mod (I think it was Interstellar); the mod had added a resource to all my ships, which caused them to fail to load. (KSP seems to check for missing parts and remove ships with them, but not missing resources.) So you might try reinstalling the mods you uninstalled and see if that helps.

Reinstalling AmpYear has solved the problem. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) Thank you!
